description: This data set includes the homeless point in time counts for New Orleans Continuum of Care and the Continuums of Care in other benchmark cities including: Atlanta (GA), Miami (FL), Tampa (FL), Nashville (TN), Memphis (TN), Raleigh (NC). Baton Rouge (LA), Oklahoma City (OK), and Louisville (KY). Data is provided annually beginning in 2005.

metadata.attribution: U.S. Department of Housing and Urban Development  Continuum of Care Homelessness Assistance Programs, Homeless Populations and Subpopulations Reports

name: Homeless Point In Time Count (2005 - Present)
